version_name: 7.3.1 update includes:+ Bracket Games push notifications (standings updates

version_description: + Further improvements and fixes on our fresh new article pages with inline images, video, tweets, and Instagram posts.

MLB box score and live data updates!
+ See advanced stats like OPS, OBP, WHIP, and Fantasy Points by swiping right on box scores. We'll bring deeper stats to all major sports soon.
+ Redesigned scoring summary
+ Middle and End of Innings now show the last out and batters due up
+ Many bug fixes

Fixes crash in news for iOS 9 devices.

Football Pick’em (Office Pool Manager) Games are back!
+ Create pick em pools in the app! Set up your pool and invite all your friends before football season.
+ Pool owners can change pool rules and invite additional users
+ New look and feel
+ Bug fixes and improvements

Football Pick’em (Office Pool Manager) Games are back!
+ Matchup analysis with video, data, and preview article
+ New "Make Picks" screen
+ Ability to invite members to your pool

Football Pick'Em games are new and improved for the start of the season! You can start pools for both pro and college games, invite friends to play, use confidence weights, run survivor pools, and get detailed matchup analysis, all from the app!

+ Fixes an issue with games being selectable from the Scores widget
+ Bug fixes and improvements in football GameTrackers

+ News has a new look! Your favorite teams are now mixed in with today's top headlines. Plus, fonts for news headlines are smaller so you can scan all of todays news faster, with less swiping.
+ Addresses a sporadic issue with CBS Radio playback
+ Bug fixes for Football Pick 'Em games

+ Addressed an issue in News for iOS 9 users
+ Updates for improved iOS 11 support

+ New WATCH tab as a hub for watching video. You can access live streams when they are available (SEC on CBS, Fantasy Football Today show and more), plus our best video clips of the moment
+ Increased the font size of the News Feed headlines — lots of users had complained it was too small. Keep the feedback coming!
+ Fixed lagging/clunky scrolling in the News feed. We believe we’ve found the root cause, but please email us at cbssports-iphone@cbsinteractive.com if you continue to see issues.
+ Fixed the Apple Watch interface to display new team logos
+ iPhone X UI updates to ensure the app looks great
+ Addresses an issue visible to Apple Watch users
+ Addresses an issue with opening some article types
+ NEW Team Schedules. More TV info, better calendar interface and easier to use. Plus European Soccer schedules now show League and Champions League/Europa Cup games.
WATCH HIGHLIGHTS! We find the best game highlights and link off to official sources, in-game and post-game. Now it's so easy to watch the plays everyone is talking about.

+ Team records now available within box scores/stats
+ CBS Sports Network now supports iOS TV Provider single sign-on
Watch Super Bowl LIII live! Super Bowl LIII is available live on CBS and streaming via the CBS Sports app on your iPhone, iPad, and other connected devices.

+ NBA and College Basketball stats and live data updates! See additional stats like minutes, offensive and defensive rebounds, and fantasy points easily by swiping right on stats.
+ It’s now easier to navigate between conferences in NCAA Basketball and Football. Tap the conference menu at the top of the screen in Scores to try it!
+ Many small bug fixes and enhancements.

+ World Cup 2018! Get ready for the tournament by following your favorite teams.
+ Fixed an issue causing the TV Provider selection to pop up unexpectedly for some users.
+ Some images were not showing up in team news. Now they are.

+ CBS Sports HQ! Our new live, always-on 24/7 video channel! Watch the latest sports news, analysis and highlights. Simply tap on HOME, then NEWS or the WATCH tab to watch anytime.
+ Bracket. Games. Are. Back! Compete in a pool against friends, family, coworkers or CBS Sports users. Fill out your bracket and follow all from the app!
+ Live Updating Bracket. Follow how the bracket unfolds. Not found in most other sports apps.
+ Follow every game in real time with upset alerts and couple taps to Live Video so you never miss a March Madness moment.
+ Quickly access your favorite teams from the main navigation.
+ Team records are now listed in Scoreboards.

+ CBS Sports HQ! Our new live, always-on 24/7 video channel! Watch the latest sports news, analysis and highlights. Simply tap on HOME, then NEWS or the WATCH tab to watch anytime.
+ Bracket. Games. Are. Back! Compete in a pool against friends, family, coworkers or CBS Sports users. Fill out your bracket and follow all from the app!
+ Live Updating Bracket. Follow how the bracket unfolds. Not found in most other sports apps.
+ Follow every game in real time with upset alerts and couple taps to Live Video so you never miss a March Madness moment.
+ Fixes an issue with using Chromecast for live video.

+ NBA and College Basketball stats and live data updates! See additional stats like minutes, offensive and defensive rebounds, and fantasy points easily by swiping right on stats.
+ It’s now easier to navigate between conferences in NCAA Basketball and Football. Tap the conference menu at the top of the screen in Scores to try it!
+ Many small bug fixes and enhancements.

+ The golf tournament schedule received a full design update making it simpler, easier, and more informative.
+ Time on Ice (TOI) stats have been added to NHL GameTracker.
+ The NFL Draft is around the corner. Prospect rankings and mock drafts will prepare you to follow along with the Draft in the CBS Sports app.
The NFL Draft starts Thursday, April 26. Be sure to follow along in the CBS Sports app to see every pick, grade, and instant analysis. Also follow along with live coverage on CBS Sports HQ!

+ It's now easier than ever to find related videos. Just play any video to see a list of similar content.
+ Easily catch up on what you missed on CBS Sports HQ. Select to watch HQ and see a list of recent aired segments.

+ The World Cup has begun! Keep up with the news, standings, live scores, and live blogs
+ The NBA Draft is June 21. Be sure to follow along to see every pick, grade, and instant analysis.
Scoreboards are now even better with easier and quicker navigation throughout the entire season. Quick access to go forward or back, or tap the current date to jump to any day or week.

Football Pick'em (Office Pool Manager) Games are back!
+ Create pick em pools in the app! Set up your pool and invite all your friends before football season.
+ Pool owners can change pool rules and invite additional users.
+ Newly added post-season play.

Football Pick'em (Office Pool Manager) Games are back!
+ Create pick em pools in the app! Set up your pool and invite all your friends before football season.
+ This version adds the ability to know who to pick for every game with in-depth matchup analysis.

We've made major under-the-hood improvements. The only difference you will notice is the app running better than ever. If you see anything that doesn't seem right, let us know at cbssports-iphone@cbsinteractive.com

+ We made some updates to Football Pick'em and fixed some other bugs so you'll be ready for football season
+ Fixed an issue causing favorite golfers to not be highlighted in Leaderboard

+ Addressed an issue with managing your Watchlist some users experienced
+ A fix for MLB player profiles sometimes not working
+ Additional fixes and updates for football
Siri Shortcuts are a powerful new feature in iOS 12 and CBS Sports is now compatible. Use Siri to launch scoreboards, jump to your favorite team, or start watching CBS Sports HQ.

+ Addresses an issue with playing embedded Twitter videos in articles.
+ Siri Shortcuts are a powerful new feature in iOS 12 and CBS Sports is now compatible. Use Siri to launch scoreboards, jump to your favorite team, or start watching CBS Sports HQ.

+ We fixed Shots-on-Goal in the NHL GameTracker
+ Small reorganization in basketball stats tables so the MIN column is no longer in the first position
+ We fixed an issue with ad sizes being improper sizes for some iPad Pro users
+ Fixes an issue with college basketball team stats in GameTracker

+ Fixed an issue with college football FCS playoff games not showing up in scoreboards
+ A few other minor bug fixes
+ Addresses an issue with the display of odds information in some cases

+ We've made a lot of big improvements to our already great Scoreboards. Some of the highlights include:
- By popular demand, your Home Scores screen is now divided by league. Your favorite teams are up at the top and leagues can be expanded or collapsed
- Easily view team records, odds, and TV information from the scoreboard
- Switch between the compact and expanded views more easily
- New animations when NFL scoring plays happen allows you to keep an eye on multiple games at once

+ Daily and weekly leaders has been expanded into NFL and NBA, available from your daily scoreboard when information is available

+ Fixed a few bugs, including an issue with Favorites not showing up in scoreboards sometimes
+ Enhanced scoreboard layout for iPad users
Watch Super Bowl LIII Live! Super Bowl LIII is available live on CBS and streaming via the CBS Sports app on your iPhone, iPad, and other connected devices.
Watch Super Bowl LIII live! Super Bowl LIII is available live on CBS and streaming via the CBS Sports app on your iPhone, iPad, and other connected devices.

+ Standings for all leagues has been updated and improved. Get more data points like division/conference records and current streaks , as well as projections from the experts
+ Fixed a bug with pause/play controls of CBS Sports Radio from the iOS Control Center
+ New animations for scoring plays in Scoreboards makes it easy to see when scoring plays happen

+ NCAA Basketball now includes the newly developed NET rankings
+ Chromecast support has been updated to address an issue some users experienced

+ Bracket games are back! Start a pool and play against friends or fill out your bracket for the chance to win a trip to the 2020 Final Four®
+ More options to watch CBS Sports on the big screen. In addition to Chromecast, CBS Sports now supports casting video to your AppleTV, Roku, and FireTV. Cast any video from clips and highlights, to CBS Sports HQ, to live games.
Bracket games are here! Follow all the tournament games and check your bracket picks.

+ The golf leaderboard has an updated look with a projected cutline, player earnings, faster updates, and improved golfer scorecards. Check it out and watch The Masters live April 11-14.
+ New notification options available for combat sports, auto racing, and horse racing
+ Access CBS Sports podcasts, from Off the Bench to Fantasy Football Today
Free live stream of The Masters Tournament! Live leaderboards, analysis & more!
The 2019 NFL Draft is April 25-27. The CBS Sports Draft Tracker provides instant access to every pick with analysis and grades. Tune in to CBS Sports HQ for in-depth coverage of the Draft!
Live stream the PGA Championship! Rounds 3 & 4 will be streaming live in the CBS Sports app on Saturday and Sunday, May 18-19.

Team screens have received a lot of big improvements. Visual updates provide quick access to team records and rank. We’ve added more in-depth team and player stats. Rosters have new clean look and we added depth charts. Detailed team transactions and injury information is also available. This is in addition to the already great team schedule and the latest headlines, videos, and social content.

+ The 2019 NBA Draft is Thursday, June 20. The CBS Sports Draft Tracker provides instant access to every pick with analysis and grades. Tune in to CBS Sports HQ for in-depth coverage of the Draft!

+ You can now quickly access standings for individual leagues from the Home Scores screen.

+ Team screens continue to get better. Track player injuries from a new tab when viewing any team.

+ The 2019 NBA Draft is Thursday, June 20. The CBS Sports Draft Tracker provides instant access to every pick with analysis and grades. Tune in to CBS Sports HQ for in-depth coverage of the Draft!

+ You can now quickly access standings for individual leagues from the Home Scores screen.

+ Team screens continue to get better. Track player injuries from a new tab when viewing any team.

+ Addresses an issue causing the app to crash experienced by some users who previously updated to version 10.13.

+ CBS Sports HQ has always provided in-depth game analysis and highlights, and game highlights are now quicker to access directly from scoreboards!
+ Several bug fixes

+ CBS Sports HQ has always provided in-depth game analysis and highlights, and game highlights are now quicker to access directly from scoreboards!
+ Several bug fixes

+ Golf World Rankings are now available, in addition to FedEx Cup and Money Leaders rankings
+ College football is right around the corner. We've added the CBS Sports poll to team rankings to help get you ready

Football Pick'em games are back!
+ Create pick em pools in the app! Set up your pool and invite all your friends before football season.
+ Pool owners can change pool rules and invite additional users.
+ Newly added post-season play.

Football Pick’em games are back with more games and more ways to win!
+ Create football pick’em and survivor pools and make your picks each week
+ College Pick’em - Start a college football pool with friends or make picks for the chance to win cash
+ Parlay Pick’em - Pick the perfect parlay to win big-time cash prizes and up the action by competing against friends

+ Updated to iOS 13? Use the new dark mode? CBS Sports is now fully compatible.
+ Game odds are now more readily available in football GameTracker
+ We've updated our Football Pick'em games lobby to make all the games easier to get to from one place. Keep your picks coming, beat your friends, and win prizes.

+ Updated to iOS 13? Use the new dark mode? CBS Sports is now fully compatible.
+ Game odds are now more readily available in football GameTracker
+ We've updated our Football Pick'em games lobby to make all the games easier to get to from one place. Keep your picks coming, beat your friends, and win prizes.

+ Game odds are now more readily available in baseball, basketball, and hockey GameTrackers!
+ Some minor improvements for dark mode and other bug fixes.

+ Dark Mode support in news
+ Fixed a bug causing empty space in the middle of articles
+ Additional under-the-hood updates and fixes
Just a few fixes and optimizations in this release. See the full app description for more info.
Introducing Playoff Pick’em: start a customizable picks pool with friends or compete for a cash prize.

We've made major improvements to GameTrackers for football! Some notable updates include:
* A new, clean look
* Game odds data is more in-depth and accessible any time
* Preview games with full analysis article, team matchup comparisons and league rankings, and Key Players
* Review in-depth play-by-play during and after a game and its Top Performers

Watch live games and events from CBS, including the AFC Divisional Round and Conference Championship games! Stream events from all of your favorite sports directly on your iPhone or iPad! Simply log in with your TV provider.

A handful of bug fixes, including:
- A crash on iPad impacting some users trying to sign in or use the Watch List
- Fixes to basketball GameTracker
- The color of the current date in Scoreboards for those using the "Button Shapes" accessibility setting
A few more bug fixes and minor updates.

+ We've made major improvements to GameTrackers for basketball! Some notable updates include:
* A new, clean look
* Game odds data is more in-depth and accessible any time
* Preview games with full analysis article, team matchup comparisons and league rankings, and Key Players
* Review games in-depth with All Plays during and after a game and the game's Top Performers

+ Bracket games are back! Get a jump on Selection Sunday by starting your pools and inviting your friends.

+ Bracket Games are back! Set up your pools and invite your friends. Brackets unlock Selection Sunday!

+ Follow every game of the tournament with our new basketball GameTrackers! We've continue to build on the last update to bring you even better game odds data and display, more data in each game preview, and improvements to Game Flow.

2020 NFL Draft
+ Real time picks and analysis in the CBS Sports Draft Tracker
+ Watch CBS Sports HQ 24/7 for the latest

+ Improved handling of postponed/canceled events

+ Additional enhancements and bug fixes

Ready for the return of MLB? We definitely are and to prove it we have a whole new GameTracker experience for baseball. It features:
* A new, clean look
* In-depth game odds
* Preview games with full analysis article, team matchup comparisons and league rankings, and Key Players
* Review games with All Plays during and after a game and see the game's Top Performers

Player details have received a big upgrade with a better look and more stats.

Picture-in-picture is now available on iPhone! Watch live video or clips while continuing to move around the app.

+ Get in-depth with your players with new game logs available from individual player screens.
+ The new Standings Overview in GameTrackers gives you a comparison of key standings details between opposing teams
+ Fixed an issue causing golf tournaments to not show up in the Home scoreboard
Added support to sign in with Apple or Google. Sign in to the CBS Sports app to sync your favorite teams, play Golf Props each week, and more.

New Watch experience! The new Watch screen makes it easier to find more great content and see what's coming up later in the week. Watch upcoming Golf on CBS as well as the newly added UEFA Europa and Champions League games on CBS All Access!

Wondering if the weather will impact the outcome? Our scoreboard now shows the weather at the stadium!

Golf leaderboard has been updated to support Stableford scoring, in addition to traditional scoring methods.

Bug fixes for MLB GameTracker.

New Apple Airplay support lets you enjoy CBS Sports HQ, UEFA soccer, golf tournaments, and other video content on the big screen with ease through your AppleTV.

Improved video player controls, easy access to full screen playback, and picture-in-picture support.

Check out who the starting pitchers will be on our full-width cells in the scoreboard.

What's the wind speed on the course going into the final round? Weather information has been extended to the golf leaderboard.

+ The 2020 NFL regular season is underway! This release includes fixes and enhancements for the start of the season.
+ Additional bug fixes and improvements.

GameTracker enhancement:
+ Mini Scoreboard at the top of the GameTracker - scan and follow along in games around the league while tracking the most important game
+ Quickly swipe to another GameTracker using left/right swipe gestures
+ Easily close the GameTracker with pull down gesture

Updated handling for NFL Wild Card expansion in standings.

+ Keep the game streaming while checking stats and other games with iPhone picture-in-picture support. Stream select SEC games on CBS All Access and CBS Sports Network this weekend!
+ Some bug fixes, including the ordering of live plays in football GameTracker and articles jumping to the bottom
+ Improved support for iOS 14
Just a few minor fixes this time. Be sure to log in and answer questions every week in our Football Props Pick'em game for your chance to win!

+ Watching the game and want to check the stats? Quick access to GameTracker when watching a live event makes this easier than ever.
+ We've made some enhancements to picture-in-picture to make it even better
+ Some bug fixes to Scoreboards and GameTrackers

+ UEFA continues with Champions and Europa League group stages. Follow every match and watch games live!
+ Fixed a couple bugs related to video and made other minor enhancements
+ A few small fixes and updates

New look, same great app! It’s everything you love about CBS Sports, but now with even MORE to love. Check out what’s changed:

IMPROVED NAVIGATION: Dive deep into your favorite teams and sports quickly via the More menu. Our all-new, persistent tab bar lets you access stats, breaking news, and live games with just one tap.

FAST-PACED SCORING: Find your favorites in a flash! The evolved scores page offers swipeable navigation and new day-picker tabs. If you do too much time-traveling, just tap the scores tab to bring you back to current day.

YOUR TEAMS AT YOUR FINGERTIPS: Favorite teams and followed games are bold and prominent in the new scores experience, so you can easily keep track of the teams you care about.

· Improved NHL standings support for the 2020-21 season
· Other minor "under the hood" improvements and bug fixes
Stream Paramount+ sports exclusives like UEFA Champions and Europa Leagues, Brasileirão Série A, Argentina's Liga Profesional de Fútbol, CONCACAF, and NWSL with a Paramount+ Subscription

Bracket games are back! Start a pool and play against friends or fill out your bracket for the chance to win a trip to the 2022 Final Four®

Interested in reordering your leagues in the home scoreboard? Now you can. Visit "Scores Preferences" to make your customizations.

CBS Sports Radio is also back! Listen live, 24/7.

Bracket games are back! Start a pool and play against friends or fill out your bracket for the chance to win a trip to the 2022 Final Four®

Interested in reordering your leagues in the home scoreboard? Now you can. Visit "Scores Preferences" to make your customizations.

CBS Sports Radio is also back! Listen live, 24/7.

+ The Masters Tournament is April 8-11! Watch multiple streams, get live analysis analysis, & more!
+ A new section in golf leaderboards makes it easier to see your favorite golfers at the top
+ Games for your favorite teams now honor the scoreboard layout setting, instead of always being full-width
+ NBA standings now denotes the new playoff format for play-in tournament eligible teams

+ The 2021 NFL Draft starts Thursday, April 29. Use the CBS Sports Draft Tracker to follow your team's picks throughout the entire draft.
+ Quickly access teams and leagues with the new search option in More
+ Follow Champions and Europa League promotion and relegation statuses in soccer league standings

+ Updated handling for the upcoming NFL 2021 season schedule
+ The MLB Scoreboard now displays starting pitchers
+ Bug fixes & other under-the-hood improvements

The NWSL regular season kicks off May 15th and you can now use the CBS Sports app to:
- Add your favorite NWSL team
- See NWSL games in the scoreboard
- Keep updated with live match notifications
- Get full team schedules, standings, and news

The NWSL regular season is underway and you can now use the CBS Sports app to:
- Add your favorite NWSL team
- See NWSL games in the scoreboard
- Keep updated with live match notifications
- Get full team schedules, standings, stats, rosters, and news
Minor bug fixes and improvements
A handful of bug fixes and UI improvements

· New WNBA experience! You can now follow your favorite teams, set the league as a favorite, and view game details. Customize the app now and be ready for the season to start back up Aug 15th.
· Improved NWSL GameTracker - follow all the key moments in the game and view lineups.
· Watching the game later? Want to avoid spoiler alerts? Long press a game notification to mute remaining notifications for that game.

+ Quickly access league standings from the scoreboard
+ Bug fixes & other under-the-hood improvements

· Football Pick'em games are back! Visit your picks pool or create one today.
· New for 2021 - compete in the College Football Pick'em Challenge for your chance to win $100,000! Tap the "More" tab to get started.
· Set your pick'em games notification settings up to get pick reminders and other useful tips for making the right picks!
